title: XPENG Targets Huge Sales Growth In 2026 Again — Looking Forward & Backwards
description:
Two weeks ago, I reported on XPENG’s huge rise in sales in 2025. It might have been the largest EV sales rise in 2025. Note that the leaders in the market grew by 28% (BYD) and shrunk by 10% (Tesla). XPENG’s sales grew by 126%, from 190,068 to 429,445. However, ... [continued]

The post XPENG Targets Huge Sales Growth In 2026 Again — Looking Forward & Backwards appeared first on CleanTechnica.
